summary: This is Dovahkiin Manor, but with Stormcloaks instead of Imperial(s)
descriptionHtml:
[font=timesnewroman][center][b]===>>> Dovahkiin Manor <<<===
---> by TukkOrdo <---[/b][/center]

[center][img]http://zalthor.sitesled.com/skyrim_banner.jpg[/img]

Description:

[b][color=#FF0000]***ATTENTION! This is the Stormcloak Version, If you\'re looking for the Imperial legion verion, follow the link bellow.***[/b][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20339][b]Skyrim Nexus[/url][/b]
or
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=79368046][b]Steam Workshop[/url][/b]

This House in located just outside Fort Hraggstad 

[youtube]dclfhnRuKLs[/youtube][/center]

[b]This house/outside includes[/b]

[b][color=#FF0000]Outside:[/color][/b]
Tanning Rack
Workbench
Anvil
Grindstone
x6 Stormcloak Soldiers
x4 Stormcloak Tents (SML)
x1 Stormcloak Tent (LRG)
Camp Fire

[b][color=#FF0000]Inside:[/color][/b]
Bed
x2 Shelfs
x4 Chests (These chests where not touched in the update, everything put inside them before 1.5 is still there)
Large Shelf
Dresser (Same as chests)
Bed Roll
Bookcase (Same as chests)
Alchemy Station
Archane Enchantment table
Food Crafting station
and some nick nacks =P (Everywhere)

_________________
[b][color=#FF0000]Links:[/color][/b]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=84089655][b]Skyrim: Steam Workshop version[/b][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20339][b]Skyrim Nexus version[/b][/url]
_________________

[b][color=#FF0000]Update History:[/color][/b]
- V.1.6 - Fast Travel point added.

- V. 1.5 - Overhual of Dovahkiin\'s House interior. Overhual of the outside of Dovahkiin\'s House, minor bug fixs and lighting fix.

- v. 1.0 - Overhual of Dovahkiin\'s basement, minor bug fixs and lighting fix.

- v. .5 - Initial Release.

_________________

[b][color=#FF0000]Archive contents of the mod:[/color][/b]

TukkOrdosHouse.esp
_________________


[b][color=#FF0000]Installation:[/color][/b]
Place the .esp file that came with this mod in your Skyrim\'s Data Folder
or
Hit Subscribe
_________________

[b][color=#FF0000]Uninstallation:[/color][/b]
Remove the .esp file that came with this mod from your Skyrim\'s Data Folder
or
Hit Unsubscribe
_________________

[b][color=#FF0000]Bugs, Requirements and Conflicts:[/color][/b]
None so far. Feel free to report and post suggestions. If you don\'t like something, please provide constructive criticism. If you don\'t like anything, please keep your thoughts to yourself.

_________________

[b][color=#FF0000]Disclaimer:
Do not upload this mod anywhere without specific permission from the authors. Do not post mediafire links on youtube videos! However, you may instead post direct links to the mod\'s release page.

This mod is uploaded on Steam Workshop/Skyrim Nexus by TukkOrdo

Do not use assets of this mod in your own project or release without giving proper credit. We may be very inclined to provide permission if we consider your plans worthy, so please ask us first.[/color][/b]
________________

[b][color=#ff0000]Credits:[/color][/b]

Lord Jesus for helping me see the light, and dying on the cross for our sins.
zalthor@btinternet.com for banner(s).
Bathesda for Skyrim.
You, the people for supporting me.
_________________

[b][color=#FF0000]Contact:[/color][/b]
By direct comment on the mod\'s release page!
By e-mail for TukkOrdo to tukkordo@gmail.com[/font]
author: TukkOrdo
